sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2010/L.8), SBSTA: agrees to continue the research dialogue at SBSTA 34; notes the need to further enhance interaction between scientific and policy communities by strengthening the research dialogue; requests the Secretariat to organize a workshop at SBSTA 34 to allow further consideration of issues addressed in the SBSTA 34 research dialogue; and invites research programmes and organizations to provide updated scientific information at SBSTA 33.
